attributes.action: Mp who fall asleep at work to be handed thier notice
attributes.background: Too many mps are getting caught on camera asleep in the house of commans this is not acceptable on the tax payers money to fund this outrageous behaviour

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Mp who fall asleep at work to be handed thier notice" or how you would like this to work.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask for the rules of the House of Commons to be changed, to introduce a penalty for MPs found to be sleeping in the House of Commons Chamber, if that's what you would like to happen.
